Text.Cost_Treatment: Tus nqi ntawm Kev Kho Mob
Text.Email_Err: Thov koj nruab ib lub email app!

Main_Menu_Choices.0: Txoj Kev Noj Qab Haus Huv

General_Menu_Choices.2: Lus nug rau koj tus kws kho mob

Facts_Menu_Choices.0: Cov hniav thiab cov Gum Care
Facts_Menu_Choices.1: Mus ntsib tus kws kho hniav

0.Name: Siv Tshuaj Tua Kab Mob
0.Description: Tej Yaam Tsis Txhob Ua Hais Txug Ntawm Cov Tshuaj Tiv thaiv Kab Mob

Usage.0: Yog thaum koj siv tsis haum

DO.0: Nug koj tug kws khu mob seb tshuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob puas zoo (paab) koj los sis koj tsev neeg tej kev mob.
DO.1: Nug koj tug kws khu mob txug cov kaab mob bacteria kws muaj yeej rua cov tshuaj tiv thaiv kab mob thiab seb koj tuaj yeem ua li cas thiaj li pab tiv thaiv kua nwg tsi txhob tso tshwm si ntxiv.
DO.2: Nug koj tug kws khu mob sib puas yog nwg muab cov tshuaj kws koj yuav tsum tau ntawd rau koj xwb.
DO.3: Nug koj tug kws khu mob seb tej tshuaj tiv thaiv nwg muab ntawv puas yog tej muaj zug kuas khu tau yug tug mob tsaws le has xwb.
DO.4: Noj tshuaj tiv thaiv kab mob rua tej kaab mob bacterial infection kws yaam kaab mob ntawd yeej tshuaj ntxuam xyuas zoo zoo hab paub meej lawm hos tej  tshuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob ntawv yuav tsum yog kws khu mob sau ntawv yuav tshuaj raun yug xwb.
DO.5: Siv tej tshuaj kom raws le kws khu mob has (qha). Noj tshuaj kom raws le qha hab raws caij xyoo le hais. Yuav tsum noj tshuaj kom pub sij hawm raws le kws koj tug kws khu-mob teev ntseg. Tsi ua raws le has lo ssis tseg tsi noj raws le has yuav thiv thaiv tsi tau kaab mob raws le kws khu-mob tau has. Txawm tas koj xis neeg me ntsis lawm los noj kuam koj cov tshuaj taag!

DONT.0: TSI XOB quab yuam, los sis, nug  koj tug kws khu mob kom nug muab tshuaj tiv thaiv rua koj
DONT.1: TSI XOB noj tshuaj tiv thaiv kab mob thaum koj ua kub/ua no (ua npaws).
DONT.2: TSI XOB siv tshuaj tiv thaiv kab mob thaum muaj viral infection nwg tsi muaj kuab (pab tsis tau).
DONT.3: TSI XOB siv tshuaj tiv thaiv kab mob yog tas tsi tau tso cai lug ntawm tug kws khu mob.
DONT.4: TSI XOB faib tshuaj tiv thaiv kab mob nrug lwm twg tuab neeg los sis muab tej tshuaj ntawd lwm qho lug  kws tsis tau txo cai muag lug siv.
DONT.5: TSI XOB siv tshuaj tivb thaiv kaab mob vim yog koj nyob ze rua tug tuab neeg kws muaj mob.

1.Name: Amoxicillin
1.Description: Tshuaj siv lug khu kaab mob kws nwg yog bacterial infection kws muaj rua ntawm pob ntseg, qhov ntswg, tawv qaj, hab plaws zig. Nwg yuav tiv thaiv xws le mob ntxws (bronchitis), mob ntsws muaj dlej (pneumonia), mob tug nru hab mob kaab si kis lug ntawv kev sib dee (gonorrhea).
1.Uses: Muaj mob plaab los sis mob hauv sab, thoj plaab, mob qhov ncauj los sis tej tawv nqaj, mob - zoo le ua npaws hab ua paa nyuaj.

2.Name: Azithromycin
2.Description: Yaam tshuaj nuav siv lug dlaw tivthaiv mob pob tseg, tawv nqaj hab kev ua paa (respiratory bacterial infections).
2.Uses: Thoj plaab, txob, nqajtawv tshwm pob lab hab ua npaws.

3.Name: Ceftriaxone
3.Description: Yaam tshuaj siv lug d tiv thaiv kom kaab mob bacteria tsi xob luj taus, nwg siv lug khu tug kab mob kis lug ntawm kev sib deev, gonorrhea, mob raws daim npluag hlwb tau hau (meningitis), mob pob ntseg, mob ntsws hab mob ntawm dlaim tawv nqaj.
3.Uses: Thoj plaab, mob taub hau, kiv taub hau hab tawm fws heev.

4.Name: Cephalexin
4.Description: Yaam tshuaj siv lug khu, bacterial infection, kaab mob pob ntseg, mob hlaab sab ntsws hlaab ua paa, respiratory system, nqaj tawv, hab hlaab zig.
4.Uses: Yaam tsi zoo (teeb meem): Thoj plaab, mob plaab, ib ce no ntxiag hab ua npaws.

5.Name: Doxycycline
5.Description: Yaam tshuaj kws lug khu yam kaab mob, bacteria, kws ua pob ntxhau, mob nyuav, mob qhov muag, mob txeeb zig hab ua pob.
5.Uses: Nqu, tho jplaab, zig dlaaj (nro), mob tej pob qhi txhaa/tej leeg, mob taub hau hab kiv tau hau.

6.Name: Erythromycin
6.Description: Yaam tshuaj nuav siv lug paab kuam tej kaab mob, becteria, txhob luj ntxiv los sis tua kom tsi xob muaj kaab mob ntxiv le lawm.
6.Uses: Yaam tsi zoo (teeb meem): Ua npaws, tawv nqaj muaj pob lab, muaj mob plaab hab ntuav.

7.Name: Flucloxacillin
7.Description: Yaam tshuaj siv lug khu mob pob tseg, taub ntswg , hab qaa. Nwg tseeg siv rau mob tug nru ha mob hlab sia hlab ntsws xws le ntsws muaj dlej.
7.Uses: Nqajtawv xoo pob lab, mob leeg/mob pob qhi txhaa, muaj teeb meem ntawm lub sab hab ua npaws.

8.Name: Levaquin
8.Description: Tshuaj siv lugku kaab mob (bacterial infection) nyob ntawm tawv nqaj, zaigzig, tsaum, hab lub tau kua xoo  (prostate), nwg kuj lug ntaus kaab mob xws le mob ntsws muaj dlej (pneumonia) hab mob ntsws (bronchitis).
8.Uses: Yuav mob heev, tej qhi txhaa txhaav, ndloog, xaab, hab teeb meem thau yug mus ke (txaav los sis ua zug)

9.Name: Metronidazole
9.Description: Yaam tshuaj nuav yuav siv lug tua, khu,  thaum muaj kaab mob nyob ntawm dlaim tawv nqaj, los sis nyob ntawm plaab, yaag teg yaag taws (tej pob qi txhaa), quas puj chaw mos (vagina) hab hlaab sab ntxws ua paa.
9.Uses: Tsi pum kev zoo (plooj qhov muag), tem pig toob, ua npaws, mob taub hau hab ntuav.

10.Name: Ofloxacin
10.Description: Yaam tshuaj siv lug khu kaab mob (bacterial infection) xws le mob ntsws (bronchitis), kas cees (chlamydia, gonorrhea), nqaj tawv hab mob txeeb zig.
10.Uses: Thoj laab, kiv taub hau, nyob nyob ca le mob, qaub dlab peg, hab ua npaws.

11.Name: Penecillin G
11.Description: Yaam tshuaj siv lug pab (khu) yaag kaab mob xws le mob npluag paaj hlwb (meningitis), mob kis lug ntawm kev sib deev (gonorrhea), hab syphilis.
11.Uses: Nqaj tawv xoo pob lab, tho jplaab, mob plaab, mob taub hau hab ua npaws.

0.Name: Chlamydia
0.Description: Tshwm sim los ntawm kev sib deev tsis hais chaw mos los yog ntawm chaw tawm rooj. Tej thaum kuj yog kis los ntawm kev sib yaim thaum muaj kev ua niam txiv los yog muab tes kov qhov muag. Qee zaum cov pojniam uas xeeb menyuam, kuj kis tau mus rau nws tug menyuam rau lub caij uas nws los yug tug menyuam ntawd. Feem coob cov pojniam tsis paub yog lawv tau txais tug kab mob no lawm.
0.Symptoms: Mob plab; mob plaws zis; tshwm paj (pom muaj ntshav) ua ntej lub sijhawm coj khaub ncaws; ua npaws; hnov mob thaum muaj kev ua niam txiv; mob thaum tso zis thiab hnov mob kub lug; hauv tej chaw mos o lossis o rau ntawm qhov quav; hnov dim zis tshaj li txhua zaus, los yog zis tsw phem. Yog txiv neej muaj tug mob no lawm, kuj ua rau lawv mob plaws zis, ua paug los yog txia kua yig hauv txivneej qhov chaw mos los, noob qau o los yog qhov quav o. Nyob rau ntawm pojniam thiab txivneej, chlamydia yuav ua tau rau tej qhov quav khaus los yog los ntshav. Nwg kuj ua tau rau tib neeg thoj plab thiab tawm kua yig lossis ua paug. Thaum cov chlamydia kis tau rau qhov muag lawm, nws yuav liab, khaus, thiab liab muag. Thaum chlamydia kis tau rau yus lub caj pas lawm, nws yuav hnov mob. Chlamydia tsuas tshwm thaum sawv ntxov xwb, dhau ntawv lawm nws yuav mob me ntsi lawm xwb. Yog koj los yog koj tug txij nkawm muaj tej xwm xheej li hais no, yuav tsum tau mus cuag neb tug kws kho mob. Yog koj cev xeeb tub, nws yog ib yam tseem ceeb heev rau koj, koj thiaj paub pab koj tug kheej.
0.Treatment: Tsis tas yuav siv tshuaj antibiotics dabtsi.

1.Name: Ear Infection
1.Description: Yam mob no nws tshwm sim los ntawm kab mob bacteria lossis tej viruses uas thaum xub pib yog ua khaub thuas. Yuav muaj dej teev rau hauv qhov ntsej.
1.Symptoms: Nuws yuav muaj tsos mob xws li ua npaws, mob taub hau, los yog yuav mob ntau hnub. Yuav tsum tau noj los yog txhaj tshuaj antibiotics los pab.
1.Treatment: Feem ntau mas yuav zoo zuj zus li ntawm ib ob lub lim piam.

2.Name: H. Pylori
2.Description: Yog ib yam kab mob uas ua rau tej kis plab lossis nre plab.
2.Symptoms: Nyob sab hauv yus lub plab mob los yog o.
2.Treatment: Qhov mob no yuav kho tau yog tua kom tag cov kab mob ces nus mam li zoo nus zuj zus. Thiab siv cov tshuaj tua kab lus tswj cov kab mob no.

3.Name: Impetigo
3.Description: Impetigo yog ib yam kab mob ntawm daim tawv nqaj uas feem ntau pib thaum muaj kab mob bacteria. Feem ntau mas tshwm sim nyob ntawm tej daim tawv nqaij, nkag los ntawm tej tawv nqaj to lossis kos.
3.Symptoms: Tawm tej lub hlwv ua kaub puab daj nrog kua yig nyob ntawm tib neeg lub cev. Yog tias muab khawb lawm, yuav kis tau mus rau lwm qhov chaw ntawm yus lub cev. Muaj kis mus tau rau me nyuam yaus dua tej laus.

4.Name: Lyme Disease
4.Description: Yam kab mob no yog kis los ntawm cov tuv tom mos lwj lossis cov kauv uas muaj mob. Thaum muaj ib tug tuv tom tug mos lwj uas muaj mob es ho lo tau rau tus tib neeg lawm, qhov kab mob ntawd yuav kis rau tib neeg.
4.Symptoms: Mob lub mis, hnov no, nkees, ua kub ua no, xoo pob liab, txiv mis tawm kua yig, ua paug, los yog o.
4.Treatment: Siv tshuaj tiv thaiv kab mob antibiotics. Noj tej tshuaj tsis muaj kuab pes tsawg los pab kom nyob taus.

5.Name: Mastitis
5.Description: Yam mob hu ua mastitis no tshwm sim tau rau ntawm pojniam lub mis rau lub caij uas nws pub mis rau nws tug menyuam noj thawj thawj 6 lub lim piam ntawd. Kev pab tau yog nqus cov kua mis tawm thiab siv tshuaj antibiotics los tiv thaiv.
5.Symptoms: Mob lub mis, hnov no, nkees, ua kub ua no, xoo pob liab, txiv mis tawm kua yig, ua paug, los yog o.
5.Treatment: Kev pab tau yog nqus cov kua mis tawm thiab siv tshuaj antibiotics los tiv thaiv.

6.Name: Mononucleosis
6.Description: Muaj lub npe hias tias mono lossis kab mob sib hnia.
6.Symptoms: Yam mob no yog kis los ntawm tej qaub ncaug.
6.Treatment: Nws yuav muaj tsos mob xws li ua npaws, mob tug nrhu qa, mob taub hau, thiab mob caj pas.

7.Name: Necrotizing Fasciitis
7.Description: Ib yam kab mob uas yog Bacterial Infections, kis rau ntawm tej daim tawv nqaj, tej nqaij rog, thiab tej leeg yam sai heev.
7.Symptoms: Nkees, tsis muaj zog, ua npaws thiab ua daus no, tawm hws, xeev siab, xeev ntuav, kiv taub hau, los yog tso zis heev heev
7.Treatment: Nkaug tshuaj tiv thaiv muaj zog antibiotics mus rau ntawm tej leeg, txiav tes taw tawm kom tsis txob kis tau mus rau lwm qhov chaw

8.Name: Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV)
8.Description: Yam kab mob no kis rau huav lub ntsws thiab ntawm txoj hlab ua pa.
8.Symptoms: RSV yuav ua rau cov laus muaj khaub thuas me ntsis, tabsis yuav ua tau rau cov menyuam mos thiab cov neeg laus laus muaj mob nyhav.
8.Treatment: Nwg tsi muaj ib yam tshuaj los pab cuam tau, tabsis feem ntau tsuas yog mob li ib ob lub lim piam xwb.

9.Name: Strep Throat
9.Description: Strep throat yog ib yam kab mob bacterial infection nyob ntawm caj pas thiab tug nrhu
9.Symptoms: Mob qa, tej qhog caj dab o, mob thaum nqos quab ncaug, tug nrhu o, ua npaw, no ib ce, lossis tsis xis neej

10.Name: Type 2 Herpes
10.Description: Yog ib yam mob uas tawm hlwv rau ntawv qhov quav
10.Symptoms: Yam mob no yus yuav kis tau los ntawm tug neeg uas muaj HSV-2 yog koj tau nrog nws sib deev.
10.Treatment: Txawm hais tias tsis muaj kev daws tau yam mob no los, nws kuj muaj kev pab cuam kom tsis txob huam mob loj ntxiv.

11.Name: Urinary Tract Infection
11.Description: Txoj hlab zis uas cov zis los rau ntawm lub zais zis tawm ntawm lub cev-nws nyob ze ntawm qhov quav (anus). Cov kab mob uas nyob ntawm txoj nyhuv loj, xws le E. coli, yuav nkag tau yooj yim rau ntawm lub qhov quav mus rau ntawm txoj hlab zis. Dlau ntawd lawm, nws yuav nkag mus rau ntawm lub zais zis, yog hais tias tsis kho tug mob no, nws yuav ua mob mus rau ntaum ob lub raum. Poj niam yog cov uas muaj tau yam mob no zoo yim dua vim lawv txoj hlab zis luv dua. Vim li no, tug kab mob thiaj li mus rau lub zais zis sai. Kev ua niam txiv lossis sib deev, los yeej ua tau muaj kab mob bacteria no rau ntawm txoj hlab zis thiab.
11.Symptoms: Yog xav paub seb puas yog UTI, yuav tau saib tej kev mob tswm sim raws li ntawm no: thaum tso zis, hnov kub lug, txawm tso zis tag lawm los yeej tseem zoo li yuav rov tso zis dua, hnov raub qaum thiab plab mog mob; cov zis dub dub thiab tsw pheem lossis tsw tau tug ntxhiab txawv txawv; hnov nkees lossis ib ce tshee tshee; ua npaws lossis hnov ib ce no no (Qhov no qhia tau hais tias tej kab mob kis mus txog koj ob lub raum lawm).

12.Name: Valley Fever
12.Description: Hom kab mob no tshwm sim los ntawm tej pwm uas nyob xyaw av, Coccidioides immitis. Cua yuav ntsawj tej noob lossis tej paj, thaum yus nqus tau rau hauv tej ntsws ces yuav rais mus ua ib tug mob
12.Symptoms: Yuav hnov mob rau ntawm hauv siab, ib ce no, nkees, ua npaws, ua qoob lossis ua pob liab, yuav mlogg zoo li ua pa tsis nto thiab poob pound.
12.Treatment: Muaj tshuaj pab cheem los yog tiv thaiv tug mob no. Tsis tas yuav siv tshuaj antibiotics dabtsi.

FAQ.0: Qhov tsawv ntawm bacterial hab viral infections yog dlaab tsi?
FAQ.1: Yaam kws qha tau tas yog bacterial infections tsawv ntawm viral infections le caag?
FAQ.2: Kev khu bacterial hab viral infection yog sib tsaws le caag?
FAQ.3: Thaus twg kuv le siv tshuaj lug tiv thaiv kaab mob?  Puas muaj lwm yaam kws yug siv es tsis muaj teeb meem , lwm txuj kev paab (khu) tug mob tau?
FAQ.4: Tej txhuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob yuav tsim teeb meem rua yug cov kab mob nyeg (cov bacteria ib txwm muaj) huv yug lub ceb li caag?
FAQ.5: Kev siv tshuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob nwg puas muaj kev cuam txhuam txug lwm yaam tshuaj xws le tshuaj tsi xob pub muaj miv nyuas?
FAQ.6: Yaam kaab mob twg kws twv cov  tshuaj  tiv thaiv kaab mob? Yog pheej siv tshuaj tib thaiv kaab mob puas ua tsua muaj teeb meem rov yaav pem suab txog kev kho tug mob bacterial infection? Yuav tiv thaiv tej nuav le caag?
FAQ.7: Yuav noj peg tsawg ntsav (lub) thaus noj tshuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob? Nwg yuav siv ntev npaum le caag?
FAQ.8: Puas ua le caag yog  kuv yuav tej tshuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob nuav qhov twg lov? Yog ua nuav, vim le caag?
FAQ.9: Nwg puas txhum ntsuaj yog has tas kuv noj tshuaj nrug zaub mov los sis siv nrug dlej cawv?

Multi_Part_Question.0: Thaum noj tshuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob nrug lwm yam tshuaj...
Multi_Part_Question.1: Thaum siv tshuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob...

0.A: Yaam tshuaj dlaab tsi kws  kuv yuav tsum cev  faaj thaum siv tshuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob?
0.B: Nwg puas muaj tej yaam tshuaj kws siv tsis tau thaus siv tshuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob?
0.C: Thaum peb noj ntau yaam tshuam lawm puas muaj tej yaam twv los sis ua mob rua yug tug kheej kws yuav tau faj seeb xyuas hab?

1.A: Kuv puas yuav tsum noj mov ua ntej yuav noj tshuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob?
1.B: Kev siv tshuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob nuav yuav noj/siv  ntev npaum le caag?
1.C: Thaum twg tej tshuaj maam le ua hauj lwm? Ua caag es kuv txhaj le paub tas nwg ua hauj lwm?
1.D: Yog thaum paub tas zoo zog lawm, kuv puas tseem noj kom taag raws le teev tseg?
1.E: Nwg puas ua le caag yog tas kuv tsi noj raws le has (tseg tsis noj)?
1.F: Thaum kuv siv cov tshuaj tiv thaiv kaab mob lawm puas  muaj lwm yam kev mob tshwm sim kws kuv yuav tau ceev faaj/tsum kwm txug?

0.Title: Txhuam
0.Info:
Kev txhuam hniav yog txoj kab loj tiv thaiv ntawm lub qhov ncauj tsis zoo.

Khais:
	• Txhuam cov hniav tsawg kawg 2 zaug hauv ib hnub
	• Tsom ntsoov rau txhuam kom ntev li 2 feeb
	• Txav Kev Txhuam Txhuam kom paub meej pem hauv ntej, nraub qaum, thiab saum cov hniav
	• Ua haujlwm ntawm kev sib faib cov hniav los ntawm cov chaw, xws li pem hauv ntej, sab laug, thiab sab xis kom ua tiav tu zoo
	• Txhuam koj tus nplaig tuaj yeem pab tshem tawm cov kab mob phem thiab ua pa dua
	• Txhaj Txhim Kho ntawm cov pos hniav kuj zoo Rau qhov lub qhov ncauj tawm ntawm qhov ncauj tawm
	• Lub plawv los ntawm cov pos hniav yog qhov qub yog tias tus neeg siv tsis tau txhuam lawv cov hniav ib ntus.

1.Title: Yav tas
1.Info:
Pom zoo kom siv hlua dig hniav ib zaug ib hnub.

Khais:
	• Tshem tawm li ntawm 18 ntiv ntawm cov hlua dig thiab cua nyob ib sab ntawm txhua tus tes kom cov hlua dig hniav nruj kom nruj heev
	• Tuav txoj hlua khi ntawm lub taub hau thiab tus ntiv tes
	• Tuav txoj hlua nias ntawm koj cov hniav uas siv cov lus sib dhos zoo los ua kom yooj yim
	• Thaum pib lub cev txoj hlab ntshav ntawm cov pos hniav yeej zoo li qub.

2.Title: Ncauj Mus Ntxuav
2.Info:
Muaj ob lub ntsiab lus ntawm qhov ncauj tshuaj yaug:

• Tshuaj pleev ib ce:
	o Tsis muaj teebmeem dabtsi rau kev kho hniav
	o Siv sijhawm ua tsis taus pa ua tsis zoo.

• Kho mob:
	o Txo cov quav hniav
	o Ua kom tsis muaj kabmob
	o Ua pa tsis zoo
	o Kuab hniav ntev
	o Alveolar osteitis (lub qhov ntswg qhuav)
	o Mob ntshav qab zib
	o Mob xuab moos
	o Xerostomia (qhov ncauj qhuav)
	o Qhov kev mob ntawm qhov ncauj

3.Title: Noj cov zaub mov
3.Info:
• Kev noj haus yog thawj kab kev tiv thaiv rau qhov ncauj kev noj qab haus huv, koj noj dab tsi yog qhov tseem ceeb npaum li cas koj tswj koj lub qhov ncauj.
• Noj cov vitamins thiab minerals ua rau noj zaub mov zoo.

Qhov no tej zaum yuav muaj xws li:
	• Cov khoom noj uas muaj calcium ntau, xws li cov kua mis tsis muaj rog lossis yog rog tsis muaj rog, yogurt thiab cheese, cov kua dej qab zib muaj dej khov thiab taum, cov zaub txhwb qaib, almonds thiab cov zaub ntsuab ntsuab tuaj yeem pab txhawb cov hniav thiab cov pob txha.
	• Phosphorus pom hauv cov qe, ntses, nqaij ntshiv, khoom noj khoom haus, txiv ntseej thiab taum yog qhov zoo rau cov hniav uas muaj zog.
	• Cov Vitamin C txhawb kev mob nkeeg, yog li noj citrus txiv hmab txiv ntoo, txiv lws suav, kua txob, broccoli, qos yaj ywm thiab spinach.

4.Title: Koj yuav mus ntsib kws kho hniav ntau npaum cas?
4.Info: Kev mus ntsib kws kho mob li niaj zaus yuav tsum yog li ntawm txhua 6 lub hlis los txo qhov kis tau tus kab mob los yog tsis muaj teeb meem ntawm lub qhov ncauj.

5.Title: Rau Cov Menyuam
5.Info: Nws raug nquahu kom cov menyuam pom lawv tus kws kho hniav sai li sai tau thaum lawv thawj tus hniav tuaj, lossis lawv lub hnub yug thawj zaug.

6.Title: Rau Cov Neeg Laus
6.Info: Koj tus kws kho hniav yuav qhia koj ntau npaum li cas mus ntsib kws kho hniav nyob ntawm koj lub qhov ncauj mob. Tus neeg laus uas muaj qhov ncauj zoo huv lub cev yuav tau mus ntsib kws kho hniav ib zaug lossis ob zaug hauv ib xyoos, thaum ib tus neeg laus uas muaj teeb meem ntawm kev kho hniav ntau zaus yuav tau mus ntau zaus.

7.Title: Koj yuav tsum mus ntau zaus yog tias koj:
7.Info:
• Kev haus luam yeeb (ua luam yeeb yuav ua rau cov kab mob kis hniav thiab/lossis mob cancer hauv lub qhov ncauj)
	• Yog tias cev xeeb tub (koj lub cev tso cov tshuaj hormones tuaj yeem ua kom mob)
	• Muaj ntshav qab zib (muaj teeb meem dua ntawm kab mob pos hniav thiab lwm yam teeb meem)
	• Koj muaj kab mob hauv lub plawv (kev mob hniav yog txuas rau kev mob plawv)
	• HIV zoo (kev pheej hmoo siab ntawm hniav lwj thiab kab mob)

8.Title: Koj yuav tsum tau ntsib lossis hu rau tus kws kho hniav yog tias koj:
8.Info:
• Taws hniav lossis mob pos hniav uas mob heev dua lossis tsis mus.
	• Muaj cov pos hniav uas muaj xim liab, o, los ntshav yooj yim.
	• Muaj ib qho mob hauv koj lub qhov ncauj uas tsis kho.
	• Muaj tus hniav rhiab kub, txias, lossis muaj kev nyuab siab.
	• Muaj qee yam tsis raug nrog koj qhov kev kho hniav qub.
	• Tsis ua li cas.
	• Muaj qhov ncauj qhuav txhua hnub.
	• Hnov mob los yog txhaj cov suab nrov hauv koj lub puab tsaig.

0.Info:
• Ib ntawm plaub tus me nyuam yaus muaj kev paub txog hniav lwj ua ntej lawv pib kawm ntawv. 
• 50% ntawm txhua tus menyuam hnub nyoog 12 txog 15 xyoos muaj kab noj hniav. 
• 1/7 (13%) cov hluas uas muaj hnub nyoog 12 txog 19 xyoos muaj tsawg kawg yog ib qho tsis muaj qhov tsis muaj hniav lwj. 
• Pib txij li ob peb hnub tom qab yug los.

1.Info:
• Ob zaug ib hnub rau tsawg kawg 2 feeb. 
• Yog tias koj xav tau, siv ib daig hlua khau mus txog 18 ntiv (inches), uas koj siv lub tshuab tshiab ob peb qho hniav tsis muaj reinserting cov kab mob uas koj nyuam qhuav tshem tawm.

2.Info:
• Cov kua roj kua dej ua hauj lwm los ntawm kev ua kom muaj cov tshuaj fluoride nyob rau sab nraud ntawm cov kaus hniav, qhov no ua kom cov tshuaj fluoride nce thaum lub sij hawm ntxov ntxov ntawm de-mineralization. 
• Cov tshuaj fluoride xws li cov tshuaj txhuam hniav, lub qhov ncauj yaug, thiab cov chaw ua haujlwm kho kaus hniav tau pom tias yuav txo tau cov kabmob (kab noj) ntawm 30% thiab 70% piv rau tsis muaj cov tshuaj fluoride.

3.Step: Paub tias thaum twg yuav pauv qhov txhuam hniav
3.Info:
• Hloov cov txhuam hniav peb mus rau plaub zaus hauv ib lub xyoo - los yog sai dua yog tias cov bristles ua tsis raws cai los yog raug txhom. 
• Nco ntsoov yaug koj tus txhuam hniav nrog dej tom qab txhuam thiab khaws cia rau hauv txoj haujlwm ncaj ncaj. 
• Sim ua kom koj tus txhuam hniav cais ntawm lwm tus txhuam hniav hauv tib lub nrog rau kom tsis txhob kis tus kabmob.

4.Step: Yaug los yog Chew Gum Tom Qab Noj Mov
4.Info:
• Lub zog ntawm txoj kev zom zom nce nce zuj zus hauv qhov ncauj; Yog hais tias noj mov tom qab noj mov, qhov nce cov kua qaub caws tuaj yeem pab ua kom tsis txhob muaj cov kua qaub uas tau ua thaum cov zaub mov tawg ntawm cov kab mob hauv cov quav hniav. 
• Cov pos hniav yog ib qho kev txhawm rau txhuam thiab hlua khi, tab sis cov zom zawg tsis hloov txhuam thiab hlua dig. 
• Cov kev tshawb fawb soj ntsuam tau pom hais tias cov zom qab tsis muaj suab thaj rau 20 feeb tom qab noj mov yuav pab tiv thaiv kom hniav lwj.

5.Step: Tsis txhob haus luam yeeb lossis Siv Luam Yeeb
5.Info:
• Ua kom poob ntawm koj cov hniav ua ntej lub hnub nyoog 65 xyoos tseem nyuam qhuav txuam nrog 50% ntawm qhov kev pheej hmoo ntawm kev tuag ntawm txhua yam ua rau. 
• Yog tias koj haus luam yeeb lossis haus luam yeeb, lossis haus dej haus cawv, koj muaj feem yuav ua rau mob ntsws lossis mob qog nqaij hlav hauv lub qhov ncauj thiab cov kab mob pos hniav. 
• Cov neeg haus luam yeeb tshiab uas siv cov khoom tsis muaj haus luam yeeb yuav muaj kev ua pa tsw phem, xim daj-xim av ntawm lawv cov hniav thiab qhov ncauj qhov ncauj.

6.Step: Tsis txhob noj cov khoom noj uas muaj suab thaj/tswj tus nqi ntawm Qab Zib
6.Info:
• Zam cov khoom qab zib uas nyob hauv koj lub qhov ncauj kom ntev, zoo li tawv, nplaum los yog chewy ntau hom khoom qab zib. 
• Muab cov khoom noj txom ncauj zoo, xws li cheese, txiv hmab txiv ntoo, yogurt, txiv laum huab xeeb, kua mis thiab cov nqaij tsis muaj suab thaj. 
• Txuag koj cov khoom qab zib kom kawg ntawm kev noj mov ua ntej hnub pib txhuam hniav, es hnub ntawd. 
• Hloov dej rau cov dej qab zib thiab kua txiv hmab txiv ntoo. 
• Nqaij kabmob hauv koj lub qhov ncauj digest cov zaub mov koj noj thiab tshwj xeeb yog pub rau hauv qab zib, ua cov acids uas yuav maj mam txhuam hniav txhuam hniav thiab ua kom hniav lwj.

7.Step: Mus ntsib ib tug kws kho hniav
7.Info:
• Kev mus kuaj hniav tsis tu ncua yog qhov tseem ceeb vim tias lawv tuaj yeem pab tshawb tau cov teeb meem kev kho hniav ntxov ntxov thaum kho tau yooj yim thiab pheej yig dua. 
• Yog tias koj tsis muaj mob, koj tuaj yeem muaj teebmeem rau kev kho hniav uas tsuas yog ib tus kws kho hniav tuaj yeem kuaj xyuas. Kev mus kuaj mob tsis tu ncua kuj tseem tuaj yeem pab tiv thaiv teeb meem los ntawm kev tsim kho. 
• Qee tus neeg yuav tsum mus ntsib kws kho hniav ib zaug lossis ob zaug hauv ib xyoos, lwm tus yuav tsum tau mus xyuas ntau dua. Koj yog ib tus neeg tshwj xeeb, nrog kev luag nyav thiab kev xav tau tshwj xeeb thaum nws los ua kom koj lub ntsej muag luag.

0.Name: Tooth Decay (Cavities)
0.Causes: Cov quav hniav yuav ua rau muaj hniav lwj thiab kab noj hniav. Cov kab mob ua rau muaj kev txhuam hniav ntawm cov kua qaub uas ua los ntawm cov kab mob uas nyob hauv cov quav hniav, nrog rau cov pos hniav thiab nyob rau hauv cov zom ntawm cov hniav. Noj cov zaub mov hauv cov carbohydrates ua rau cov kab mob ua kom muaj cov kua qaub uas yog lub luag hauj lwm los cuam tshuam txheej txheej ntawm tus hniav txha hniav los yog cov hauv paus hniav tuaj yoj.
0.Treatment: Txhua hnub txhuam hniav, hlua dig hniav, thiab yaug nrog tshuaj fluoride. Kev kho cov tshuaj fluoride tuaj yeem pab rov qab tau hniav txhuam hniav thiab cov kabmob uas thim rov qab tuaj yeem ua thaum ntxov. Cov phom sij thaum cov hniav lwj tau ploj mus dhau ntawm cov qib theem. Cov yas hniav yog rau ntau lwj lossis tsis muaj zog cov hniav, npaj los hloov tus hniav lub cev yas. Cov hauv paus hniav tuaj yeem kho thiab txuag cov kev puas tsuaj lossis tus kab mob kis rau thaum twg cov hniav lwj mus txog hauv cov ntaub ntawv ntawm cov hniav. Kev rho hniav rau cov hniav uas tau ua lwj loj heev lawv tsis tuaj yeem txum tim lossis tshem tawm.
0.Cost_Treatment: Nrog rau cov ntaub ntim, qhov nqi yog $50 txog $150 nyob ntawm seb koj puas xav tau nyiaj los yog dawb ntsaws.

1.Name: Gingivitis
1.Symptoms: Cov pos hniav/cov pos hniav, cov pos hniav ua tau yooj yim
1.Causes: Nws yog ib hom kab mob ntawm cov pos hniav. Cov kab mob ua rau mob ntawm cov pos hniav. Cov quav hniav ntev thiab cov pa sib tw ntev dua rau ntawm cov hniav qhov teeb meem ntau dua lawv. Tshwm sim ntawm cov kab mob thiab mob ntawm cov pos hniav thiab pob txha uas nyob ib ncig ntawm cov hniav. Cov kev mob nyhav xws li, mob ntshav qab zib, tsis muaj zog tiv thaiv kab mob, thiab lub cev tsis huv hauv lub qhov ncauj ua rau tus neeg muaj kev pheej hmoo los ntawm kev mob ntsws.
1.Treatment: Txhua hnub txhuam thiab hlua dig hniav, thiab tu txhua tus kws kho hniav. Yog tias tsis kam kho, cov pob txha uas pab txhawb cov hniav tuaj yeem poob, thiab cov pos hniav yuav kis tau. Nws thiaj li ua rau cov hniav poob vim qhov tsis muaj pob txha yug.
1.Cost_Treatment: Tus nqi txhuam hniav, tshuaj txhuam hniav, siv hlua dig hniav thiab/los yog ua tau txhua txhua hnub los ntawm $4-$75.

2.Name: Periodontitis
2.Symptoms: Cov pos hniav o, los ntshav cov pos hniav, poob hniav
2.Causes: Thaum mob gingivitis tsis kho, nws tuaj yeem ua ntej rau cov kab mob (uas txhais tau tias tus kab mob nyob ib ncig ntawm tus hniav). Cov pos hniav rub tawm ntawm cov hniav thiab daim ntawv hu ua "hnab ris" uas kis mob. Cov no yog cov kab mob uas ua rau mob pos hniav thiab pob txha uas tuav cov hniav nyob rau hauv qhov chaw. Yog tias tsis kho, cov pob txha, cov pos hniav, thiab cov ntaub so ntswg uas pab txhawb cov hniav tuaj yeem raug rhuav tshem. Cov hniav nws thiaj li yuav xoob thiab yuav tsum tau muab tshem tawm.
2.Treatment: Yuav tsum mus rau thiab ua tau los ntawm ib tug kws tshaj lij. Lawv yuav txiav txim siab seb yuav tsum ua li cas, tsis hais ib qho kev kho mob li cas los yog kev kho mob phais.
2.Cost_Treatment: Tus nqi rau kev kho mob Gingivitis nws txawv nrog qhov mob ntawm tus kab mob no nws pib ntawm $75 - $3,600.

3.Name: Tooth Loss
3.Symptoms: Cov pos hniav o, los ntshav cov pos hniav, poob hniav
3.Causes: Feem ntau tshwm sim los ntawm cov kab noj hniav thiab kab mob ntsws uas nws cuam tshuam rau lub hnub nyoog 65-74.
3.Treatment: Txhuam txhuam koj cov hniav, hlua dig hniav, thiab yaug nrog tshuaj fluoride thiab tshuaj tiv thaiv antiseptic txhua hnub.
3.Cost_Treatment: Tus nqi ntawm kev kho hniav tsis pom muaj qhov txawv ntawm qhov uas tus hniav pib ntawm $300 - $1,000.

4.Name: Oral Cancer
4.Symptoms: Mob nqos, mob hauv qhov ncauj lossis pob ntseg
4.Causes: Kev coj cwj pwm coj zoo li tob tob, haus cawv txhua yam.
4.Treatment: Kev paub ntxov ntxov, kev phais hauv lub qhov ncauj thiab kev kho hluav taws xob.
4.Cost_Treatment: Nws nyob ntawm seb tus mob cancer yog dab tsi; nws yuav mus rau ntawm $60,000 thiab tshuaj chemo yuav yog $15,000- $20,000 duas las rau ib hlis twg.

Settings.Background:
Koom HuTsev Nyaab Xeeb (Healthy House), ib lub koomhum kws lug qha txug kev txais lug rua saab healthcare, yog lug paab cuam rua kev no jqaab haus huv ntawm lub zej zog huv lub Loom taj California, nwg yog ib lub nroog kws muaj ntau hom tuab neeg tshaaj plawg ntawm lub teb chaw nuav. 

Nwg yog lub tswv cuab, nrug rua UC Engineering hab Project Protect student groups , kws tsim tau muaj ib qho kev qha (application) lug nthuav txug tej teeb meem kev siv tshuaj yuam kev hab siv tsis raw le has. 

Tej sawv dlhawg siv tshuaj tiv thaiv kab mob tsis raws le has (siv ntau dlau lawm) rau thaum muaj mob ua yog viral infection, kws tej tshuaj paab tsis tau. Qhov nuav yuav tau siv tej tshuaj kom muaj zug dlua los si siv ntau dlua lug khu tej mob thaum muaj cov (bacteria infection). Qhov nuav yog ua kom haaj yaam muaj teeb meem ntxiv.  Tsis taag le ntawd, tej kev siv tshuaj tivthaiv kab mob (antibiotics) naj nub nua siv tsi raws le has. Pev txwv le, Yog tug tuab neeg mob ntawd tsi noj tshuaj raws le has tseg tes yuav ua rua tej kev mob nkeeg tsi xaam, nwg tug mob yuav tsis zoo tu qaab. Dlhau le ntawd, tej tshuaj kws suav dlawg naj nub yuav yaas tsi muaj ntaub ntawv, tsis raug cai,los yog ib qho teeb meem quas qeeg. Tej tshuaj ntawd ib qho nwg muaj zug dlhau los sis nwg tsi yog siv lug rua qhov kws nwg mob ntawd. 

Yog le ntawd, vaam hab ca-sab tas qhov ‘app’ nuav yuav paab dlaw tau tej teeb meem kev siv tshuaj tiv thaiv kab mob (antibiotic) hab yuav ua le caag txhaj le paub cuam tau.

Title_VI: Muaj ntau yam cai tsis hais Federal los yog State yuav kom muaj kev koom tes rau sab kev hais lus kom muaj kev sib to taub. Yam tshwj xeeb tshaj, U.S. Department of Health and Human Services Office for Civil Rights (OCR) xav kom tag nrho cov neeg ua tau txais nyiaj txiag ua kom raws txoj cai los the Nai 6 (Title VI) uas yog the Civil Rights Act nyob rau xyoo 1964. Kev koom tes no yog txwv tsis pub muaj kev saib tsis taus lwm haiv neeg, xws li tsis muaj kev ncaj ncees rau sab kev hais lus rau cov neeg uas tsis paub lus Askiv lossis Limited English Proficiency (LEP). Yog xav tau neeg txhais lus, hu rau Healthy House: (209) 724-0102. Yog xav paub txog tsab cai Nqi 6 (Title VI) hu tau rau (800) 242-2752 lossis hu tau mus rau lawv qhov chaw uas yog Office of Civil Rights (415) 437-8310
